name: Zombie Horror Physics: The Final Key
name_original: Zombie Horror Physics: The Final Key
description:
This is my learn-how-to-use-unreal-engine 'game' for the Watch + Jam.

Shoot zombies and send their corpses flying! Collect Flashlights! Smash Chairs! Find the sub-ocean!
And of course, unlock all the doors.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to look and shoot
E to interact
F to use flashlight
R to reload
